title: OCE match making.. NA job
body:
So, i've created a smurf and finally hit level 30, getting all excited to smash these placements since i put some rp to buy my champs and managed to save up for my runes. During my placements (all 10 games) i somehow managed to get teamed up a bunch of unranked kids. I'm not complaining that im getting unrankeds in my team, it's the fact that i am playing against silver 3's up to gold 3's. My team mates are going 1/13, 2/10. So riot how on earth am i meant to win games with this match making. I have given them advice and i got reported x3 for verbal abuse. I have reported them for int feed then next game i get them again. 
is it too much to ask for a balanced team?
According to lolskill each game i have played in they have a 60+ win chance. This is dumb. Proof below
https://gyazo.com/69df8b0a36ba611fd27273a680ab6099
https://gyazo.com/0cf9039282e7b22273bdc9feeb3dbcea
I'm not being greedy and saying this just for me to win, for example 
https://gyazo.com/6fcda70dad56b447890e01ab9a384878 this team had to deal with what i was going through too and lost.

replies.body: Lolskill counts a ranked player and an unranked player very differently, which is why you're seeing a 60+% win chance. Until you get ranked, those statistics won't mean anything and shouldn't really be taken into account.
